topic.title: Support SmartTVT project by providing a unique Segment-ID

body.p: The checkbox With TVT tracking IDs on the document export window must only be used when required to support unique IBM TVT (Translation Verification Test) processing. When exporting a Unicode encoded file from , a unique segment identifier is added around each translatable segment. During TVT, when a piece of text needs to be changed, this unique identifier can be used to identify the segment number and document name which contains that piece of text.
This is a purely technical implementation, with no impact on translations performed in . So there is no further description in this document.
